title: Sometime my game just crash
body:
My Game just crash out for repare gamefile sometimes when im in game and is happen alot and i getting leave ban for it so annoy. 
How do i fix it and how can i advoid it in the future

replies.body: Is this still happening even after a repair?  If so then something could be blocking it from installing correctly.  Double check your anti-virus or firewalls to make sure there are no blocks, and our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can help with that.  You should stick to customs for now to troubleshoot, but let me know in more detail (like error messages) if this happens again.
